body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #14605 (Return of the Banman by dongcarl)
* #14489 (refactor: Drop boost::thread and boost::chrono by ken2812221)
* #13937 (Track best-possible-headers (TheBlueMatt) by Sjors)
* #13864 (validation: Document where we are intentionally ignoring bool return values from validation related functions by practicalswift)
* #13462 (Simplify common case of CHashWriter and drop SerializeHash by Empact)
* #13258 (uint256: Remove unnecessary crypto/common.h dependency by kallewoof)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
